...Xem thÃªm

We just tasted our dinner here. It our return after one year. Nothing change. Our peaceful place for relax. 

We ordered one pax of boiled clams with lemongrass, one pax of Co Gia  Quy special salad, half of grilled chicken, a steamed glutinous rice, 2 ice-tea glasses. Delicious. And I'm very like the sauce with salad. It's very special and delicious. 

I'm very thank to the waiter. He is professional and very dedicate. He gives to us a fully dinner.

Bill costs 349k. Very reasonable for a dinner of 2 persons . 

Now we can use Credit Card to pay. (Last year we must pay by cash). We will come back more often.

But there are some cats which run around our table. And I don't like the cats. There are some mosquitos too although the waiter prepared for us anti-mosquitos stick.

Update address: 850, Nguyen Van Tao, Hiep Phuoc, Nha Be, HCM City.
